#include<stdio.h>
//#define gc() getchar()
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
inline int fastread()
{
int i=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<48) c=gc();
while(c>47)
{
i=i*10+c-48;
c=gc();
}
return i;
}
int main()
{
    int t,x,i;
    long long a[65];
    a[0]=2;a[1]=3;
    for(i=2;i<64;i++)
    {
        a[i]=a[i-1]+a[i-2];
    }
    t=fastread();
    while(t--)
    {
        x=fastread();
        printf("%lld\n",a[x-1]);
    }
return 0;
 
}
